text: V ubytke ostalis' te, kotoryye otritsali vstrechu s Allakhom v Sudnyy den' i nakazaniye, schitaya eto lozh'yu i prodolzhaya byt' neveruyushchimi, nastaivali na etom. I kogda prishol k nim vnezapno chas rasplaty v Den' voskreseniya, togda oni, raskayavshis', voskliknuli: "Gore nam za to, chto otklonyalis' ot Istiny Allakha v nashey blizhayshey zhizni i prenebregali yeyu!" Oni ponesut noshu svoikh grekhov i zlodeyaniy. O, kak tyazhela nosha grekhov, kotoruyu oni ponesut
